name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】SHARPLY Unsheathed. Here I Go! 3Dお披露目配信！これが古代兵器の本気。 #AnyaMelfissa3D [QVxgwstf-Aw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Gekkou' by Anya Melfissa, Kureiji Ollie, and Pavolia Reine.
Anya talks to the audience about the performance and then notices a giant flying Yagoo head.

subtitles.original: あなたみたいになれやしなくて
subtitles.english: I can't become like you

subtitles.original: あの月を追いかけるように
subtitles.english: Like chasing that moon

subtitles.original: 渇いた心は
subtitles.english: My parched heart

subtitles.original: 満たされないまま
subtitles.english: Remains unfulfilled

subtitles.original: ひとりになって、ひとりになって
subtitles.english: All alone, all alone

subtitles.original: くすんだ夢を見続けてしまった
subtitles.english: I kept on seeing a faded dream

subtitles.original: ガラクタだって、ボロギレだって
subtitles.english: Even if it's junk, even if it's rags

subtitles.original: その心臓が脈打つ限りには
subtitles.english: As long as that heart beats

subtitles.original: 僕だけの怒りがあった
subtitles.english: There was an anger only I could feel

subtitles.original: 足りないのは何だったんだろう
subtitles.english: What was it that was missing?

subtitles.original: 神様に聞いてきたあとで
subtitles.english: After I went to ask God

subtitles.original: 堕天使の弓矢に口止めされた
subtitles.english: A fallen angel's arrow silenced me

subtitles.original: 初めから知っていたんだよ
subtitles.english: I knew it from the start

subtitles.original: 忘れた芝居をしてんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm just pretending I forgot

subtitles.original: もらいもんの剣を抱きしめている
subtitles.english: Clutching onto a borrowed sword

subtitles.original: 何十回目の失望だろう
subtitles.english: How many times have I been disappointed now?

subtitles.original: いっそ何もかも捨ててしまいたいと
subtitles.english: I'd rather just throw everything away

subtitles.original: 結局最後は何にも残らない
subtitles.english: In the end, nothing remains

subtitles.original: 愛も紡いでも名前も朽ちていく
subtitles.english: Love and the names we weave also decay

subtitles.original: どうしてだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder why

subtitles.original: この胸の奥にこびりついている
subtitles.english: It's stuck deep within my chest

subtitles.original: 冬の夜の静寂に似た孤独を
subtitles.english: A loneliness like the silence of a winter night

subtitles.original: あなたはきっと知りもしないで
subtitles.english: You surely won't even know

subtitles.original: ひとりに星を見ていた
subtitles.english: As you watched the stars alone

subtitles.original: 赤い目の僕に気も留めないまま
subtitles.english: Without even noticing my red eyes

subtitles.original: 隣に立ってたあなた遠くで
subtitles.english: You were standing right beside me, yet so far

subtitles.original: くすんだ夢も見えなくなってしまって
subtitles.english: Even the faded dream became invisible

subtitles.original: それでも追い続けて
subtitles.english: But I'll keep on chasing it anyway

subtitles.original: 偽物だって本当だって
subtitles.english: Whether it's fake or real

subtitles.original:
振り返れば最後そこには
ぼやけた記憶があった
subtitles.english:
If I look back, in the end,
there's only a blurred memory

subtitles.original: 骸を貸したいのに
subtitles.english: I want to lend my remains

subtitles.original: クリシェを抜け出したいのに
subtitles.english: I want to escape the cliché

subtitles.original: また誰かの焼き直し？
subtitles.english: Is this another rehash of someone else?

subtitles.original: 数多の星の屑たち
subtitles.english: Multitudes of stardust

subtitles.original: 沈みゆくユーティリティ
subtitles.english: A sinking utility

subtitles.original: 無慈悲な月の光
subtitles.english: The merciless moonlight

subtitles.original: アイデンティティさえまやかし？
subtitles.english: Is even identity just a deception?

subtitles.original: 盗んででも愛が欲しい？
subtitles.english: Do you want love even if you have to steal it?

subtitles.original: 何時の世も同じことばかり繰り返す
subtitles.english: Repeating the same thing in every era

subtitles.original: 懐かしい歌が風に揺れている
subtitles.english: A nostalgic song sways in the wind

subtitles.original: あなたの声で教えてもらった言葉
subtitles.english: The words I was taught by your voice

subtitles.original: 今でも忘れぬように
subtitles.english: So that I won't forget them even now

subtitles.original: 書き留めている同じことを
subtitles.english: I'm writing down the same things

subtitles.original: あなたみたいになれやしなくて
subtitles.english: I can't become like you

subtitles.original: あの月を追いかけるように
subtitles.english: Like chasing that moon

subtitles.original: 渇いた心は満たされないまま
subtitles.english: My parched heart remains unfulfilled

subtitles.original: 時間が経って時間が経って
subtitles.english: As time passes, as time passes

subtitles.original: 振り返る時目をそらさぬように
subtitles.english: So I won't look away when looking back

subtitles.original: なぞる僕たちは
subtitles.english: We who trace our path

subtitles.original: 偽物だってボロギレだって
subtitles.english: Whether we're fakes or rags

subtitles.original: 覚めた夢を抱いた先には
subtitles.english: At the end of clutching a dream I woke from

subtitles.original: 僕だけの光がずっと
subtitles.english: My own light will always remain

subtitles.original: あ、OK guys, gimana tadi?
subtitles.english: Ah, OK guys, how was that?

subtitles.original: Emm, kita Holoro nyanyi bareng ya,
subtitles.english: Umm, we Holoro sang together,

subtitles.original: dan nge-DJ bareng.
subtitles.english: and DJ'd together.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, oh my god, capek. Capek.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, oh my god, I'm tired. So tired.

subtitles.original: OK, we sang Gekkou,
subtitles.english: OK, we sang Gekkou,

subtitles.original: me, Ollie, and Reine sang Gekkou.
subtitles.english: me, Ollie, and Reine sang Gekkou.

subtitles.original: How was it?
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original:
It's one of my favorite songs and I'm so
happy I got to sing it with them!
subtitles.english:
It's one of my favorite songs and I'm so
happy I got to sing it with them!

subtitles.original: And oh my god, ま、色々ありましたね。
subtitles.english: And oh my god, well, lots of things happened.

subtitles.original: かなた先輩とね、あの一緒にドロンしたし、
subtitles.english: I 'disappeared' together with Kanata-senpai,

subtitles.original: ま、私はドロンしてなかったんですけど。
subtitles.english: well, I didn't actually disappear myself though.

subtitles.original: で、わためちゃんともね、あのベースもね、
subtitles.english: And with Watame-chan, the bass part too,

subtitles.original: こう何にもね、あの弾きましたね。
subtitles.english: we played it like this.

subtitles.original: いやぁ、楽しかった！
subtitles.english: Man, that was fun!

subtitles.original: で、ID 2期生と一緒にDJ、そして「月光」歌いましたと。
subtitles.english:
And then the DJ session and singing
'Gekkou' with ID Gen 2.

subtitles.original: いかがでしたでしょうか？ How was it everyone?
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it everyone?

subtitles.original: ま、このあともね、色々まだあるので。
subtitles.english: Well, there's still more to come after this.

subtitles.original:
After this there's still some stuff
that I want to show you guys.
subtitles.english:
After this there's still some stuff
that I want to show you guys.

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness.
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness.

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh? What?

subtitles.original: ん？
subtitles.english: Hmm?

subtitles.original: What's that?
subtitles.english: What's that?

subtitles.original: Wait what? What's that sound?
subtitles.english: Wait what? What's that sound?

subtitles.original: Hello? Wait what? What is that?
subtitles.english: Hello? Wait what? What is that?

subtitles.original: Something is flying. Wait what?
subtitles.english: Something is flying. Wait what?

subtitles.original: Ha, kaya terlihat familiar guys.
subtitles.english: Ha, that looks familiar guys.

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ知ってる顔だぞ。え？
subtitles.english: Huh? I know that face. What?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、ちょっと見てみたい。
subtitles.english: Wait, I want to take a look.

subtitles.original: あれちょっと近く、近くから見てみたい。あれ？
subtitles.english: I want to see it from a bit closer. Huh?

subtitles.original: Is that, wait, is that YAGOO?
subtitles.english: Is that, wait, is that YAGOO?

subtitles.original: Is that YAGOO? あれ？
subtitles.english: Is that YAGOO? Huh?

subtitles.original: Ha, YAGOO ke sini guys.
subtitles.english: Ha, YAGOO's coming here guys.

subtitles.original: YAGOO-nya, YAGOO-nya bisa melayang dong kocak.
subtitles.english: YAGOO, YAGOO can fly! That's hilarious.

subtitles.original: YAGOO beneran woi.
subtitles.english: It's really YAGOO.

subtitles.original: Hai, YAGOO, YAGOO-nya bisa melayang.
subtitles.english: Hi, YAGOO, YAGOO can fly.

subtitles.original: YAGOO！
subtitles.english: YAGOO!

subtitles.original: YAGOOさん、こっちこっち！
subtitles.english: YAGOO-san, over here, over here!
